name: TogglePlayerControllable
description: Toggles whether a player can control their character or not. The player will also be unable to move their camera.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to toggle the controllability of

params_body.name: toggle
params_body.description: 0 to make them uncontrollable, 1 to make them controllable.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player specified does not exist.
